t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 1 week ago - At the time, Nike and several brands like popular shoemaker Birkenstock cut ties with Amazon due to rising concerns around counterfeit products on the company's sprawling third-party marketplace. A Nike spokesperson said on Wednesday that the company is investing in its marketplace to bring more products and services to "consumers wherever and however they choose to shop." t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 hours ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.
